function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for building hygiene principles in densely built-up areas","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation due to poor building hygiene","Mitigation":"Implement building hygiene principles and requirements for correct orientation to maximize natural heat, light, and ventilation","Technologies":"Sustainable architectural design, ventilation systems, daylighting technologies","People":"Residents in densely built-up areas","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, developers"},{"Description":"Neglect of thermal comfort and Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) in building design","Impact":"Risk of indoor air pollution and inadequate ventilation leading to health issues and disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement strategies for thermal comfort, natural ventilation, and Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) in building design","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air filtration, sustainable building materials","People":"Residents, building designers, architects","Owner":"Building designers, architects, health and environmental authorities"},{"Description":"Failure to adopt a performance-based design approach for natural daylighting and ventilation","Impact":"Inadequate natural lighting and ventilation leading to poor indoor environmental quality and health issues","Mitigation":"Shift to a performance-based design approach considering the Daylight Factor (DF) and ventilation requirements","Technologies":"Daylighting sensors, energy-efficient glazing, natural ventilation systems","People":"Architects, building designers, urban planners","Owner":"Architects, building designers, urban planners"}]}
